sentences.english: Through these system's implementation, maintains throughout the safety in production the high-pressured situation.
sentences.chinese: 通过这些制度的实施，始终保持安全生产的高压态势。

sentences.english: From them we can see obviously what the compiler is emphasizing.
sentences.chinese: 从中明显可以看出诉述主体的失重态势。

sentences.english: An overheated economy can only exacerbate an incipient deterioration in inflationary expectations.
sentences.chinese: 经济过热只会使初显恶化态势的通胀预期进一步恶化。

sentences.english: A new explanation is offered for this diverging "scissors gap" in this article.
sentences.chinese: 作者对这种发散的“剪刀差”态势作了新的解释。

sentences.english: Ocean freight rates started 2009 with a positive tone.
sentences.chinese: 2009年起海洋运费呈现积极态势。

sentences.english: Whether a planet is in good or bad state, it will realize the affairs of the house.
sentences.chinese: 行星态势的好坏，会影响到其落入宫位所代表的领域。

sentences.english: Weekend, polyester and silk market continue to rise.
sentences.chinese: 双休日，涤丝市场行情继续盘升态势。

sentences.english: Rising oil prices thwarted several attempts at a comeback by the non-tech stock gauges throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 当天，上升的油价阻止了科技股的几次上涨态势。

sentences.english: The relationship between decision situation and organizational decision solution set was established through functors.
sentences.chinese: 引入函子建立态势与组织决策解集之间的关系。

sentences.english: This paper presents an algorithm for multi-frame target clustering in situation assessment.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了一种面向态势估计的多拍编群算法。

sentences.english: The nation-wide development of real estate prosperous level have maintained fast rising develop situation.
sentences.chinese: 全国房地产开发景气程度保持了快速上升的发展态势。

sentences.english: Natural pigment industry development trend of the formation of clusters.
sentences.chinese: 天然色素产业形成集群化发展态势。

sentences.english: One says sort of news because of the timid way this development has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 说是几分新意，是因为这个发展态势是羞答答的。

sentences.english: The team also decided to go with a manned turret for maximum situational awareness.
sentences.chinese: 该小组还决定使用一个最大的态势感知载人炮塔。

sentences.english: Trade with both Russia and China is also on the rise.
sentences.chinese: 与俄罗斯和中国的贸易也呈上升态势。

sentences.english: From Zheng cotton high low open view of the situation, short is more dominant.
sentences.chinese: 而从郑棉高开低走的态势来看，空头更占优势。

definition: to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
to rise again after a fall/to pick up/rally (stock market etc)
(of the weather) to warm up again
specific to a particular stage (of a project etc)/interim (policy etc)/occurring in stages/phased
